class.name: CSGConvexHull3D
class.brief_description: A CSG convex hull shape around a set of points.
class.description: This CSG node is the convex hull of a set of points, provided the points are not all coplanar. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh]. Moving a CSG node within another CSG node also has a significant CPU cost, so it should be avoided during gameplay.

members.member: The [Material] used in drawing the CSG shape.
The point array that defines the convex hull. [b]Note:[/b] If fewer than four points are defined or all points are coplanar, no mesh is generated.
